body:
*Adding some folks who last modified that part of racewalk.go*

@ianlancetaylor @dr2chase : Can you confirm if [the potential solution](https://github.com/dhananjay92/go/commit/7b1b24d58da6477243f243b902dbd7bbbb1eac1d) is good enough to be sent for review? Other than running tests and manual inspection of generated code, how can I tell if the code is working correctly?
